fullText: This blazingly funny and equally shocking work by Martin McDonagh has been given a production that captures both its savage humor and its underlying melancholy about the futility of violence.
dtliExcerpt: This blazingly funny and equally shocking work by Martin McDonagh has been given a production that captures both its savage humor and its underlying melancholy about the futility of violence.
